main.name: Larry Cessna
main.occupation: Full Stack Developer and Project Manager
main.description: I have more than 10 years of  experience working with cross-functional teams that have competing priorities to get the job done on-time and on budget
main.bio: Web developer and U.S. Navy veteran with experience in technical project management, scheduling, and coding. Fascinated by web technologies, specifically back-end development, and skilled in process improvement and breaking down a problem piece-by-piece to find a solution.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Full Stack accelerated course in React.js, JavaScript(ES6), HTML, CSS, MongoDB, SQL, and more. Member of 2 award winning teams for Minnesvart and Whale Hunter.

work.title: Technical Project Manager
work.description: Responsible for scheduling and execution of internal and external projects for more than 900 hospitals nationwide. Developed a roadmap management tool leveraging SharePoint and SQL technologies to organize the project schedule for five software engineers.

work.title: Escalation Manager
work.description: Member of the Escalation Management Team at Microsoft. Responded rapidly to emergency requests by facilitating war rooms for all Microsoft Services. Developed a management tool using Visual Basic that removed redundancies and was responsible for a marked increase in engagement and response SLAs.

work.title: Chief Petty Officer/Project Manager
work.description: Managed HR departments for Destroyer Squadron NINE, US Navy Seattle Recruiting, and the submarine tender, USS EMORY S LAND (AS 39). Managed and mentored team of 14 direct reports. Identified and solved problems early through strategic planning and communicating across multiple teams.

projects.title: Minnesvart
projects.category: Find an adventure close to home!

projects.title: Whale Hunter
projects.category: If you're in search of a whale, a rare, sought after beer, this app will help you find it

projects.title: COVID-19 Statistics
projects.category: An app that takes a city/state input to provide current COVID-19 cases in the area
